div.p: Casa Systems, Inc., is a leading provider of next-generation ultra-broadband distributed and virtualized architectures in mobile, fixed telecom and cable networks. As the original supplier of commercially deployed CCAP systems that delivers voice, video, and data over a single port, Casa continues a tradition that brings leading edge solutions to hundreds of service providers around the world.

We are seeking to hire a Software Engineer to join our Software Engineering team located in Andover, MA, USA. The Software Engineer will be responsible for developing software to increase data path performance for multi-core/multi-thread embedded telecommunication systems.

ul.li: Performs work on multi-core/multi-thread embedded telecommunication systems.
Develop software for network communication devices.
Bachelor s degree Computer Science, Computer Engineering, or Electrical Engineering; Master's degree preferred.
Up to 5 years of related experience.
Must be fluent in C programming.
Have strong understanding of computer data structure, and computer science algorithms.
Familiarity with Ethernet, IPv4 and IPv6 networks.
Familiarity with DHCP, TCP, and UDP protocols is a plus.
Familiarity with Linux OS is a plus.
Ability to communicate and work with other teams.
Able to quickly learn new technologies, as required.
Able to work in a fast-pace environment.
Problem solver Able to be resourceful and figure things out.
Self-confident Able to express opinions and influence effectively
